# f-data-card



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                    | Description                                                       |
| ----------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--f-data-card-display` | display type for data card component (default: 'inline-block')    |
| `--f-data-card-height`  | height of the data card component (default: 100%)                 |
| `--f-data-card-padding` | padding of the data card component (default: var(--spacing-xxxl)) |
| `--f-data-card-width`   | width of the data card component (default: 100%)                  |
